name: Mastodon / mstdn.io clutterless theme
description: Remove what is not essential from the mastodon frontend, such as the mascot, the FAQ block in 'getting started'. Circular avatars. Slightly round columns. demo
additional_info: The style in itself only works for mastodon.social and mstdn.io, because that's the instance I use, although you can easily modify it to work everywhere else (just change the affected URL in the style). Rounded borders and circular avatars have been added because IMO they look nicer because our eyes like round shapes more than sharp edges. But I know myself that sometimes I like to see the whole avatar, so that's why hovering them will decrease the border-radius to 10%. Demo
